import React from 'react' import Video from '../video/video.component' import './collection-details.styles.scss' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import { CustomButtonContainer } from '../custom-button/custom-button.styles' const CollectionDetails = ({items}) => { return (
{items.map(item => ( <>
{item.type} ${item.price}

{item.name}

Add to Bag Favourite

{item.description}

))}
) } export default CollectionDetails
